meanings.sent1: After the rain, she reanoints her skin with lotion.
meanings.sent2: I always reanoint the door hinges to keep them from squeaking.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to reanoint itself with oil from the salad bowl.
meanings.sent4: The old book was reanointed with a new cover, making it look fresh.
meanings.sent5: The gardener reanoints the plants with water every morning.

meanings.definition: To apply oil or ointment again.
meanings.sent1: He reanoints his dry hands with moisturizer before bed.
meanings.sent2: The athlete reanoints his muscles with soothing balm after the game.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally reanointed the salad with too much dressing.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic reanoints the gears with grease to keep them running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: She reanoints her hair with coconut oil for extra shine.

meanings.sent1: The priest reanoints the sacred relics during the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The temple was reanointed with holy oil on its anniversary.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully reanoint their toys with imaginary blessings.
meanings.sent4: The king decided to reanoint his loyal knight for his bravery.
meanings.sent5: The artist reanoints the canvas with a new layer of paint, revitalizing the artwork.
